statements: SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-08-01';
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-06-30' AND (budget > 10000 OR budget < 500);
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%brand%' ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY budget DESC
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM brand_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-06-01'
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2
SELECT * FROM brand_events ORDER BY event_date ASC, event_name DESC
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%';
SELECT * FROM brand_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-09-30' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, location, description FROM brand_events WHERE location = 'New York' OR location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT promotion_name, discount_rate FROM promotions WHERE discount_rate > 0.5
SELECT * FROM events WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30'
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_rate FROM promotions WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT event_name, location, description FROM events WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 AND end_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT brand_name, established_year FROM brands ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_rate FROM promotions WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT brand_name, established_year FROM brands WHERE established_year < 2000 ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_rate FROM promotions WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY discount_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, location FROM events WHERE event_date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT promotion_name, discount FROM promotions ORDER BY discount DESC;
SELECT event_name, location FROM events WHERE event_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT cp.participant_name, c.campaign_name, e.event_name FROM campaign_participants cp JOIN campaigns c ON cp.campaign_id = c.campaign_id JOIN events e ON e.event_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount FROM promotions WHERE discount > 10 ORDER BY promotion_name ASC;

SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns JOIN campaign_participants ON campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_participants.campaign_id WHERE participant_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, location FROM events JOIN event_attendees ON events.event_id = event_attendees.event_id WHERE attendee_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
